content: Offsetting the lower sales volume, same-store retail new vehicle gross profit per unit was   plus 134% year-over-year and in line with the fourth quarter of 2021, which typically represents our highest GP quarter due to our luxury brand mix. I wanted to book it in on one of the industry headwinds -- and one of the larger players in the vehicle market that reported a couple of weeks ago was characterizing some of what they saw in the quarter as being demand weakness, which seems a little odd to us, given everything that's going on from a price perspective suggest that demand still clearly there, but supply is constrained. Sir, please go ahead when you are ready. Sir, please go ahead when you are ready.
